name: MUMMMASTER!
description:
Many centuries ago you was a priest of Anubis and was chosen to protect the peace of the tomb of Pharaoh. The centuries have passed in peace and serenity until the greedy white men came to Egypt and started plundering the sacred Pyramids.
But they won’t catch you by surprise – the figurine of a favourite Pharaoh’s cat which they were going to steal will remain here, just as the bodies of the plunderers. You would take the proper care of them together with the mummies under your control.

Game features:
  • Craft of the mummies - pull out the mummies’ brain to increase one capacity or extract its heart to increase another. Numerous materials and artefacts affect the combat features. Boost them all!
  • In this game we protect the cat, to put it precisely – the cat’s figurine, which is a noble thing and a plus to karma of the gamer. Everyone loves the pretty cats!
  • We play for the Lord of Mummies – you are awesome in the mask of Anubis!
  • You have a lovely assistant, although a Mummy, too. She would prompt in time of need and prevents from doing dump things.
  • The game offers nine powerful bosses – get ready to encounter them!
  • The cat is not just an item of interior – it is dangerous for the enemies!
